channel.title: [317 Delta] PvP Storm {Pics Added} [Source Only]
channel.description:
Well, there's not much I can say about this.
This is a source I've been working on for about a week, and I figure it's as good as it's gonna get (by my standards).
The base I used was Pvp-Evolution, since it pretty much had everything I was looking for.
I will [b]NOT[/b] be supplying a client, as it's not hard to find or make your own.
This server is based off of one I played awhile back, which was incredibly fun, so I tried to remake it. Although I'm very far from doing so, I believe it's good enough.
Credits: 50% Pvp-Evolution 20% Me, for some small additions and changes. 15% People who supported me in making it. 10% People who assisted me in making it. 5% Anyone who uses it. Idc. :P
Since I was nagged to death for pictures, here they are (happy now?): [IMG]http://i33.tinypic.com/qnk3yx.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i35.tinypic.com/o88kzs.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i37.tinypic.com/v5v728.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i37.tinypic.com/117z31y.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i36.tinypic.com/2it0ojl.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i38.tinypic.com/2n9grj4.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i33.tinypic.com/2n8tnix.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i36.tinypic.com/akikp1.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i38.tinypic.com/1iz6o3.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i38.tinypic.com/suwl85.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i38.tinypic.com/mli41w.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i34.tinypic.com/210zko6.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i34.tinypic.com/9hknc6.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i38.tinypic.com/301izqt.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i36.tinypic.com/20gmdzr.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i38.tinypic.com/2rh07rs.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i37.tinypic.com/2f0enbm.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i36.tinypic.com/otf5h1.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i38.tinypic.com/5eadfd.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i33.tinypic.com/f20tw3.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i36.tinypic.com/155nod0.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i35.tinypic.com/161xphv.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i36.tinypic.com/20p7bs3.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i33.tinypic.com/34ildah.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i36.tinypic.com/vrwnlt.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i35.tinypic.com/9r4vt2.jpg[/img]
[url=http://www.mediafire.com/?yydgmzwyubj]Click here to Download the Source.[/url]
Again, no client. I don't care for them very much, as it's a simple tool to play on. (I used my other server's item.cfg and item.java to supply some IDs that were needed, and how they were worn. There are custom IDs in the source files here & there, but since you can remove them for your own client, I'm not doing it.)

item.title: [317 Delta] PvP Storm {Pics Added} [Source Only]
item.dc:creator: @Epic_Ancient Epic Ancient
item.description:
@Epic_Ancient wrote:

[quote=“I Yaa I, post:36, topic:307844”]Basically 90% of our community are dumbshits, your training area sucks, most of the stuff was already in pvp evolution, the prayer part was already in it…

Woo… I have made a source with Home: Yanille, I’m changing it now, I dont like leechers… =’)

^ I agree

Your little cough thing, isn’t even funny at all, neither are you little faces either. (" :x, >.>, <.< >.< ")

That’s extremely annoying, there is no way in life you are 17 years old.

Best i seen out of these fourms Rep++

^
You are an IDIOT, you probably paid someone to rep you, i remember when you PMED me asking me how to get rep

EVERYTHING that Alec said is 100% true

Best i seen out of these fourms Rep++

Not bad, coming from you.

^

Not bad, coming from him? What do you mean by that? Like he’s some retard or something? Why? Because you have 1000 posts because everyone else has lifes and doesn’t sit here all day trying to get post count?

OVERALL:
This source is as horrible as the one that I released, even probably more.

And you annoy a lot of people

EDIT: I typed too much at once… I forgot to tell you to thank me for bumping your topic[/quote]

I don’t care if most of it was in pvp evo. Pvp evo didn’t have a training area, anyways.

If you reread the main post, you’ll see I based this off an Idea I got from another server, and this wasn’t even an efforted release.

You agree on anything that basically flames me. AKA: You hate me and do anything you can to further that hate.

I didn’t intend on my “cough thing” to be funny.
And I don’t care what you think of the faces I use. There are probably over 200000000000000000000 faces posted online in some way or another daily. So, does it matter? If it annoys you, you have issues.

Alec has some issues that should be worked out. I’m getting the feeling that you have some as well. Not being mean, but it’s true, and you cannot deny it.

I don’t mean anything by “Not bad, coming from you”. “Like he’s some retard or something?” is completely opposite to what you should have said, also. “Like he’s some coding god or something?” would have fit the bill more-so. Either way, doesn’t matter.

My having 1000+ posts doesn’t make me a no-life-r.

Statistics:

Total time logged in: 4 days, 47 minutes.

95% of those posts were spent helping people in the server help section, and at times, I admit I was on here for hours bored as fuck attempting to help people. Don’t say 250 posts a day, either. It’s accumulative.

Doesn’t matter if it’s horrible. It’s released. I put almost no effort into it.

Do you have proof that I annoy a lot of people? Can you gather a list? Can you get them to post stating that they think I’m annoying and be truthful about it? You shouldn’t make accusations and not be able to back them up.
(And you will most likely post something about me that isn’t relevant to that, trying to turn the tables on me for making accusations and not being able to back them up, and fail at doing so.)

“Thank you for bumping my topic.”

Read full topic
